pyzhone package

Submodules

mxkcommands module

Commands for MXK Configuration Library

This library allows users to send premade commands to configure ONTs on DZN-Zhone’s MXK Chassis

class mxkcommands.Commands(user='admin', passw='linktoweb', host='192.168.0.41', port=23, timeout=10)

Bases: mxktelnet.MXKConfig

This class inherits functions from mxktelnet

bridgeaddmgmt(mxk, slot, port, idonu, vlan, gtp)
Summary:

Set management interface (bridge add 1-2-3-10/gpononu gtp 50 downlink-data vlan 800 tagged rg-bridged mgmt)

Parameters

  • slot (Str) – number of card in mxk chassis

  • port (Str) – number of port in slot

  • idonu (Str) – id of logical port

  • vlan (Str) – id of vlan for pppoe service

  • gtp (Str) – gpon traffic profile

Returns

Telnet string

Return type

Str

Summary:

  • port (Str) – number of port in slot

  • fsan (Str) – ont’s serial id

  • port (Str) – number of port in slot

sipnumber(slot, port, idonu, pot, rxgain, txgain, number, password, voipprofile)
Summary:

Add SIP line number (cpe voip modify 1/1/64/1 rx-gain -7 tx-gain -2 dial-number 100001 username 100001 password 123abc voip-server-profile 1 display-name 100001 description 100001)

Parameters

  • slot (Str) – number of card in mxk chassis

  • port (Str) – number of port in slot

  • idonu (Str) – id of logical port

  • pot (Str) – number of phisical sip interface

  • rxgain (Str) – rx gain

  • txgain (Str) – tx gain

  • number (Str) – sip line number

  • password (Str) – sip password

  • voipprofile (Str) – voip Profile

Returns

Telnet string

Return type

Str

mxkcommands.main()

mxktelnet module

MXK Telnet Core Library

Main core of pyzhone library This library send configuration to MXK Chassis for FTTx service It can be use to send personalized commads not listed in commands.py

class mxktelnet.MXKConfig(user='admin', passw='linktoweb', host='192.168.0.41', port=23, timeout=10)

Bases: telnetclient.TelnetClient

Main mxk configuration

sendcmdmxk(line, **kwarg) → str
Summary:

Sends commands to mxk chassis

Parameters

  • line (Str) – string of commands to send to mxk chassis

  • **kwarg – keyword arguments to replace variables in the command string

telnetclient module

class telnetclient.TelnetClient(user, passw, host, port, timeout)

Bases: object

sendcmd(line, timeout=5) → str

Summary: Send a command to the host :param line: Command to send to the host :type line: str :param timeout: Timeout in seconds. Defaults to 5. :type timeout: int, optional

Returns

Response from the host

Return type

str
